verses.roman:
mahat-sraṣṭā puruṣa, tiṅho jagat-kāraṇa
ādya-avatāra kare māyāya īkṣaṇa

synonyms: mahat-sraṣṭā—the creator of the total material energy; puruṣa—the person; tiṅho—He; jagat-kāraṇa—the cause of the material cosmic manifestation; ādya—original; avatāra—incarnation; kare—does; māyāya—over the material energy; īkṣaṇa—glance.
translation: He is known as the first puruṣa, the creator of the total material energy. He, the cause of the universes, the first incarnation, casts His glance over māyā.
